Class MarkProjectSeen

java.lang.Object

      com.compendium.ui.MarkProjectSeen
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBProgressListener, java.lang.Runnable
public class MarkProjectSeen
extends java.lang.Thread
implements DBProgressListener

Creates a thread and progress bar for marking the project as seen.

Version:
1.0
Author:
M. Begeman
